OOC: I'm very sorry to hear about this, no one in my opinion should have to
feel they need to take their own life. I never met him, but by reading
youre responses, he seemed very important, and nice. So i'm in for the day
of silence, and would help in any way I can on the memorial (except for the
fact that my computer is OLD, so I dont know how much help I could be)
